00009 Module::Module(Systeme *s,Trace * t)
00010 {
00011   trace = t;
00012   src = "module.cpp";
00013   cl = "Module";

00015   trace->print(src,cl,"Module",message);
00016   systPere = s;
00017   simuPere = s->getSimuPere();
00018   message = "fin";
00019   trace->print(src,cl,"Module",message);
00020 }

00066 void Module::chargerXML(TiXmlElement* pModuleXML)
00067 {
00068     message = "debut";
00069     trace->print(src,cl,"chargerXML",message);
00070     TiXmlElement* pElt;
00071     TiXmlHandle handleModule(0);
00072     handleModule = TiXmlHandle(pModuleXML);
00073     
00074     pElt = handleModule.FirstChild("nom_classe").Element();
00075     nom_classe = pElt->GetText();
00076     message = "nom_classe : " + nom_classe;
00077     trace->print(src,cl,"chargerXML",message);
00078     
00079     pElt = handleModule.FirstChild("nom").Element();
00080     nom = pElt->GetText();
00081     message = "nom : " + nom;
00082     trace->print(src,cl,"chargerXML",message);
00083     
00084     pElt = handleModule.FirstChild( "relation" ).Element();
00085     if (pElt == NULL)
00086     {
00087       message = "pas de relations";
00088       trace->print(src,cl,"chargerXML",message);
00089     }
00090     else
00091     {
00092       for( pElt; pElt; pElt=pElt->NextSiblingElement("relation"))
00093       {
00094         string relation = pElt->GetText();
00095         tabRelation.push_back(relation);
00096         message = "relation : " + relation;
00097         trace->print(src,cl,"chargerXML",message);
00098       }
00099     }
00100     
00101     string nomFichierLog = systPere->getNomSysteme() +"_"+ nom + ".out";
00102     message = nomFichierLog;
00103     trace->print(src,cl,"chargerXML",message);
00104     log.open(nomFichierLog.c_str(),ofstream::out | ofstream::trunc);
00105     
00106     message = "fin";
00107     trace->print(src,cl,"chargerXML",message);
00108 }
